name: nanos
description: A nanosvm unikernel module for Aesthetic Computer infrastructure.

scripts.do:deploy: npm run do:deploy:image; npm run do:deploy:instance chat; npm run do:deploy:image:list; npm run do:deploy:instance:list
scripts.gcp:deploy: npm run gcp:destroy; npm run gcp:deploy:image; npm run gcp:deploy:instance chat; npm run gcp:deploy:image:list; npm run gcp:deploy:instance:list
scripts.do:destroy: npm run do:deploy:instance:delete chat; npm run do:deploy:image:delete aesthetic-chat
scripts.gcp:destroy: npm run gcp:deploy:instance:delete chat; npm run gcp:deploy:image:delete aesthetic-chat
scripts.dev: npm install; ops pkg load eyberg/node:20.5.0 -c config-gcp.json -n -e NODE_ENV=development -a chat.mjs
scripts.gcp:deploy:image: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops image create -c config-gcp.json --package eyberg/node:20.5.0 -a chat.mjs -i aesthetic-chat -t gcp
scripts.gcp:deploy:image:list: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops image list -t gcp -c config-gcp.json
scripts.gcp:deploy:image:delete: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops image delete aesthetic-chat -t gcp -c config-gcp.json --assume-yes
scripts.gcp:deploy:instance: f() { export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops instance create aesthetic-chat -t gcp -c config-gcp.json -i $1; };f
scripts.gcp:deploy:instance:list: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops instance list -j -t gcp -c config-gcp.json | jq .
scripts.gcp:deploy:instance:delete: f() { export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./gcp-service-key.json; ops instance delete $1 -t gcp -c config-gcp.json; };f
scripts.do:deploy:image: ops image create -c config-do.json --package eyberg/node:20.5.0 -a chat.mjs -i aesthetic-chat -t do
scripts.do:deploy:image:delete: ops image delete aesthetic-chat -t do -c config-do.json --assume-yes
scripts.do:deploy:instance: f() { ops instance create aesthetic-chat -t do -c config-do.json -i $1; };f
scripts.do:deploy:instance:list: ops instance list -j -t do -c config-do.json | jq .
scripts.do:deploy:instance:delete: f() { ops instance delete $1 -t do -c config-do.json; };f
scripts.sbcl: npm run pkg:clear; npm run pkg:sbcl; npm run pkg:sbcl:finish-a; npm run pkg:sbcl:finish-b; npm run pkg:sbcl:tree; npm run pkg:sbcl:load
scripts.pkg:sbcl:finish-b: curl -o ~/.ops/local_packages/sbcl_2.3.6-2.fc39/sysroot/quicklisp.lisp https://beta.quicklisp.org/quicklisp.lisp; cp hello.lisp ~/.ops/local_packages/sbcl_2.3.6-2.fc39/sysroot; cp package.manifest ~/.ops/local_packages/sbcl_2.3.6-2.fc39; cp -r quicklisp ~/.ops/local_packages/sbcl_2.3.6-2.fc39/sysroot

author: Jeffrey Alan Scudder
